movies.title: Blaze
movies.plot: A re-imagining of the life and times of Blaze Foley, the unsung songwriting legend of the Texas Outlaw Music movement.

events.title: Live at the Austin Outhouse is recorded on two consecutive nights, weeks before Blaze's death
Live at the Austin Outhouse is recorded on two consecutive nights, weeks before Blaze's death
